TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示包含文本的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that contain text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可能不提供仅存在于特定 UI 自动化提供程序中的文本功能。The class may not provide for text features that exist only in a particular UI Automation provider. 对于这些唯一的和通常的高级功能， 类为 UI 自动化客户端提供访问相应本机对象模型的方法。For these unique and often advanced features, the class provides methods for a UI Automation client to access the corresponding native object model.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AnimationStyleAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动画仅出现在屏幕上;动画文本打印，但动画效果不会。Animations appear on the screen only; the animated text prints, but the animation effect does not. 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端通过调用获取属性的值 。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值为类型 。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值是 。The default value is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft Notepad 中文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 仅出于举例目的，Microsoft Notepad 用作文本提供程序。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1000)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2000](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2000)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CultureAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识细化到子语言级别的文本范围的 () 特性；例如，瑞士法语 (fr-CH)，而不是法语 (fr)。

span.span: Identifies the () attribute of a text range down to the sub-language level; for example, French-Switzerland (fr-CH) instead of French (fr).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端通过调用获取属性的值 。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值为类型 。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为应用程序用户界面的语言。The default value is the language of the application user interface. 有关语言代码格式的详细信息，请参阅。See for more detail on the language code format. > [!NOTE] > 可能存在这样的情况：服务器不支持语言标记，或作者不能使用它。There might be cases where the server does not support the language tag or authors cannot use it. 在这些情况下，默认值适用。In those cases the default applies. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft Notepad 中文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 仅出于举例目的，Microsoft Notepad 用作文本提供程序。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1005](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1005)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2005](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2005)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentRange As TextPatternRange

summary.span: 获取包含文档主文本的文本范围。

span.span: Gets a text range that encloses the main text of a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些辅助文本（如页眉、页脚或批注）可能不包括在内。Some auxiliary text such as headers, footnotes, or annotations might not be included. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，targetTextPattern 成员变量是 从感兴趣的文本提供程序获取的对象。In the following code example, the targetTextPattern member variable is a object obtained from a text provider of interest. summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的示例值包括 "Arial 黑色" 和 "宋体"。Example values for this attribute include "Arial Black" and "Arial Narrow". 此属性的值是非本地化的。The values for this attribute are non-localized. 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端通过调用获取属性的值 。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值为类型 。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `empty string` 。The default value is an `empty string`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft Notepad 中文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 仅出于举例目的，Microsoft Notepad 用作文本提供程序。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FontWeightAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指的是字体的相对笔划、粗细或加粗。This attribute refers to the relative stroke, thickness, or boldness of a font. 此属性在 `lfWeight` GDI LOGFONT 中的字段后建模。This attribute is modeled after the `lfWeight` field in GDI LOGFONT. 为保持一致性，已采用 LOGFONT： 0 = Connectorrouting.dontcare，100 = 精简，200 = 超细或 UltraLight，300 = 浅色，400 = Normal 或 Regular，500 = 中等，600 = SemiBold 或 DemiBold，700 = Bold，800 = ExtraBold 或超粗，900 = 厚或黑色。For consistency, the following values have been adopted from LOGFONT: 0=DontCare, 100=Thin, 200=ExtraLight or UltraLight, 300=Light, 400=Normal or Regular, 500=Medium, 600=SemiBold or DemiBold, 700=Bold, 800=ExtraBold or UltraBold, and 900=Heavy or Black. 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端通过调用获取属性的值 。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值为类型 。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值是 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft Notepad 中文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 仅出于举例目的，Microsoft Notepad 用作文本提供程序。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1008](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1008)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2008](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2008)]

UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1009](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1009)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2009](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2009)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange[] GetSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 检索与当前文本选择（或多个文本选择）关联的不连续文本范围的集合。

span.span: Retrieves a collection of disjoint text ranges associated with the current text selection or selections.

returns.span: 不连续文本范围的集合。

span.span: A collection of disjoint text ranges.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未选择任何文本，则 将返回 (空范围) 的退化文本范围，该范围系统光标 (文本插入点) 。If no text is selected, returns the degenerate text range (empty range) at the position of the system cursor (text insertion point). 如果系统光标 (文本插入点) 不存在，则 可能返回 `null` 。If the system cursor (text insertion point) is not present, might return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 使用 属性来测试控件是否支持文本插入点的文本选择或位置。Use the property to test if text selection or positioning of the text insertion point is supported by the control. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1046](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1046)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2046](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2046)]

exception.span: 文本容器不支持文本选择。

span.span: The text container does not support text selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange[] GetVisibleRanges() cil managed

summary.span: 从文本容器中检索一个不连续文本范围的数组，其中每个文本范围都以第一个部分可见的行开始，以最后一个部分可见的行结束。

span.span: Retrieves an array of disjoint text ranges from a text container where each text range begins with the first partially visible line through to the end of the last partially visible line.

returns.span: 容器内可见文本范围的集合或者一个空数组。

span.span: The collection of visible text ranges within the container or an empty array.
is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当重叠窗口或其他对象遮盖了文本容器的任何内容，或具有多列布局的文本容器部分滚动到了视图之外时，可能会出现不连续的文本范围。Disjoint text ranges may occur when any content of a text container is obscured by an overlapping window or other object, or when a text container with a multi-column layout has one or more columns partially scrolled out of view. 如果看不到任何文本，则返回一个退化 (空) 文本范围。If no text is visible, a degenerate (empty) text range is returned. 如果文本容器为空或所有文本都滚动出视图，则可以返回此空范围。This empty range can be returned if the text container is empty or when all text is scrolled out of view. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#VisibleRanges](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#visibleranges)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#VisibleRanges](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#visibleranges)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalTextAlignmentAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示应用于与调用文本范围关联的 (s) 段落的水平文本对齐方式。This attribute represents the horizontal text alignment applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示与调用文本范围关联的文档的只读状态。This attribute represents the read-only state of the document associated with the calling text range. > [!NOTE] > 如果文档或文件是只读的，但仍可以对其进行编辑，并将其另存为其他文件，则不会将文本视为只读。If a document or file is read-only, but you can still edit it and save it as another file, the text is not considered read-only. 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange RangeFromChild(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement childElement) cil managed
Public Function RangeFromChild (childElement As AutomationElement) As TextPatternRange

span.span: The enclosed object.

summary.span: 检索包含子元素（例如图像、超链接、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] 电子表格或其他嵌入对象）的一个文本范围。

span.span: Retrieves a text range enclosing a child element such as an image, hyperlink, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] spreadsheet, or other embedded object.

returns.span: 涵盖子元素的一个范围。

span.span: A range that spans the child element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果子元素所在的范围内没有任何文本，则返回一个退化 (空) 范围。If there is no text in the range where the child element exists, a degenerate (empty) range is returned. `childElement`参数是与关联的的子， 或从的子级的数组中 。The `childElement` parameter is either a child of the associated with a or from the array of children of a . ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#gettextelement)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#gettextelement)] [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetRangeFromChild](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#getrangefromchild)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetRangeFromChild](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#getrangefromchild)]

span.span: The child element is .

exception.span: 元素不是文本容器的子元素。

span.span: The element is not a child of the text container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange RangeFromPoint(valuetype System.Windows.Point screenLocation) cil managed
Public Function RangeFromPoint (screenLocation As Point) As TextPatternRange

param.name: screenLocation
param.span: 以屏幕坐标的形式表示的位置。

span.span: The location in screen coordinates.

summary.span: 返回与指定屏幕坐标最接近的退化（空）文本范围。

span.span: Returns the degenerate (empty) text range nearest to the specified screen coordinates.

returns.span: 与指定位置最接近的退化范围。

span.span: A degenerate range nearest the specified location.
is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屏幕坐标在图像、超链接、 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] 电子表格或其他嵌入对象的坐标范围内，则将返回包装子对象的文本范围。A text range that wraps a child object is returned if the screen coordinates are within the coordinates of an image, hyperlink, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] spreadsheet, or other embedded object. 由于隐藏的文本不会被忽略，因此将 返回与给定点最近的可见文本中的退化范围。Because hidden text is not ignored by , a degenerate range from the visible text closest to the given point is returned. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1049](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1049)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#1049](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#1049)]

exception.span: 给定点位于与文本模式关联的 的外部。

span.span: A given point is outside the associated with the text pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly StrikethroughColorAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端通过调用获取属性的值 。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值为类型 。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值是 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft Notepad 中文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 仅出于举例目的，Microsoft Notepad 用作文本提供程序。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent TextSelectionChangedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly TextSelectionChangedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 标识在修改文本选择时引发的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event raised when the text selection is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些文本控件将 (光标) 文本插入点作为零宽度文本选择进行处理，并且 `TextSelectionChangedEvent` 在移动光标时可能会引发。Some text controls handle the text insertion point (cursor) as a zero-width text selection and might raise `TextSelectionChangedEvent` when the cursor is moved. > [!NOTE] > 为了跟踪游标变动，建议 UI 自动化客户端通过侦听相应的元素事件来跟踪插入点更改， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 而不是根据 。To follow cursor movements, UI Automation clients are advised to keep track of insertion point changes by listening for corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element events rather than depending on . 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用，UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段 。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples [!code-csharp[FindText#SelectionChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FindText/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#selectionchanged)] [!code-vb[FindText#SelectionChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FindText/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#selectionchanged)]
